reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the collection of personal data for providing and improving the service.
reply.reference: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. URL: https://storage.googleapis.com/smilify.smilefile.uk/privacy-policy/Smilify_privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects the following types of data: pictures and other information from your device's camera and photo library that you select, and information regarding your local timezone for enabling timed notifications.

content: Pictures and other information from your Device's camera and photo library

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the sections mentioning the collection of data related to the device's camera, photo library, and local timezone for specific purposes.
reply.reference: Pictures and other information from your Device's camera and photo library that you select. Information regarding your local timezone for the purpose of enabling timed notifications that you create. URL: https://storage.googleapis.com/smilify.smilefile.uk/privacy-policy/Smilify_privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the Application Provider may use Personal Data for various purposes such as maintaining the Service, responding to user requests, and performing contract obligations. This indicates a clear declaration of the purposes of data collection and use.
reply.reference: The Application Provider may use Personal Data for the following purposes: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service. For the performance of a contract: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service. To manage Your requests: To respond to any of Your requests to Us. URL: https://storage.googleapis.com/smilify.smilefile.uk/privacy-policy/Smilify_privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection or request the deletion of collected personal data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the user has the right to delete or request assistance in deleting personal data collected by the service.
reply.reference: You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about You. URL: https://storage.googleapis.com/smilify.smilefile.uk/privacy-policy/Smilify_privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Application Providers, third-party companies, and individuals employed by the Application Provider to facilitate the Service.

content: individuals employed by the Application Provider

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app shares data with Application Providers and other parties involved in facilitating the Service.
reply.reference: The Application Provider may share Your personal information with Application Providers, third-party companies, and individuals employed to facilitate the Service. URL: https://storage.googleapis.com/smilify.smilefile.uk/privacy-policy/Smilify_privacy_policy.html
